item.title: Report X-2024070653
item.description:
Report X-2024070653

Identified by scraper @ 2024-07-11T18:15:45+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-06-26
  • City: TULSA
  • State: OK
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: THE PACKAGE WAS FOUND BY THE HAZMAT AUDITOR AND THE BOX SEEMED LIKE IT HAD LABELS MISSING AND THE BOXED USED WOULD CONTAIN A HAZARDOUS MATERIAL, OUTER BOX HAS A PARTIALLY TORN PRODUCT LABEL THAT STATES "HAZARD FLAMMABLE LIQUID 3". CHECKED THE CONTENTS OF THE PACKAGE AND DISCOVERED THAT IT WAS A HAZMAT. THEN THEY TOOK THE SUSPECTED UNDECLARED TO THE DAMAGE CAGE.
